title: good action
review: This is one of the best movies of Tom Cruise, feels some really good acting and some surprise unpredictable in the film.In the third movie of the Mission Impossible series, Directed by J.J. Abrams, the Key characters are Tome Cruise as Ethan Hunt, Philip Seymour Hoffman as Owen Davian and Laurence Fishburne as Head Agent. Ethan Hunt is a Super-spy. He is called back into acting to confront the toughest villain. He must accept the hard mission, so he hides his wife. Davian is an international weapons and information provider. To chase Davian, Hunt assembles his team which consists of good members to search all over the world, form Rome to Shanghai City in order to rescue his wife, and uncover IMF double agents. But Hunt's little secret about his wife will have fatal consequences, finding out that happiness of his wife won't combine well with his secret work as a spy.
